keyMappings:
unmap t
map t Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map R reload hard
searchEngines:
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
wp: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia EN
yt: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
ama: https://www.amazon.co.uk/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon UK
